thread.title_full: the best backpacking accommodation located in the prettiest hutong-Naluoguxiang - Review of Beijing Downtown Backpacker Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Dibyne
title: the best backpacking accommodation located in the prettiest hutong-Naluoguxiang
text: This hostel is comparable to the excellent hostels in Singapore. Location is close to main road and subway station. Also, its location is a tourist destination itself- being the most famous and nicest huting- Nanluoguxiang, and has lots of shops for souvenirs&apparels, restaurants, and food take out counters. Has free breakfast, wifi, and lockers.Hostel staff are the best! They can fluently speak English, very accommodating to your needs, and assists you in your whereabouts. The hostel is also known for offering tours and shows. I booked for Jinshanling Great wall tour, and kung fu show.
